title: How effective is traditional Chinese medicine?
description: Answer (1 of 43): There are a LOT of answers here that are ignorant of the science done concerning TCM. There is a lot of published research including stuff published in the JAMA that shows TCM to be highly effective. There is also a lot of very badly done science concerning acupuncture. An exam...
